apps.name: ShowMania

apps.localizedDescription:
iVanced for YouTube is a modded app providing more features over the standard YouTube app.
iVanced is maintained by TherionRO on github:
[Click here to get redirected to iVanced Github]https://github.com/TherionRO/YouTubeiVanced

Note : iVanced for YouTube is a fork of uYou/uYouPlus based on the latest version of youtube,a rolling release with extended life support and likely more unstable.Keep in mind that I cannot opensource the uYou tweak and the YouTube app as this is not legal.

 


iVanced is a rolling release,most likely based on the latest YouTube version,and will provide you exclusive features such as:


-Adblocking,stop wasting time and enjoy more videos!


-Return the dislike button


-iSponsorBlock,blocks youtubers sponsorship segments,intros,outros,subscribe reminders and more!


-A/B settings


-uYou features


-Theming and customization features

 

 

Thank you for using iVanced,please check it out on github :


https://github.com/TherionRO/YouTubeiVanced
apps.name: YouTube iVanced
apps.subtitle: iVanced for YouTube
apps.versionDescription:
iVanced for YouTube 18.20.03 .Follow the project on github for more info : iVanced Repo Github .

- Updated YouTube Base

- Bug fixes

- Added the FLEX tweak for debug

- uYou Updated

- All plugins and extensions updated

- Performance bug fixes

- Everything should load faster

- App should be way smoother compared to old builds

github : https://github.com/TherionRO/YouTubeiVanced .

Thank you!

news.caption: iVanced for YouTube is a modded application for iPhone user with or without jailbreak. iVanced supports adblocking,dislikes,skip sponsors (iSponsorBlock) and many more customizations and features!The app is also 100% free.
news.title: iVanced For Youtube Now Available
